verse: In the year of King ‘Uziyahu’s death I saw Adonai sitting on a high, lofty throne! The hem of his robe filled the temple.
S’rafim stood over him, each with six wings — two for covering his face, two for covering his feet and two for flying.
They were crying out to each other,
The doorposts shook at the sound of their shouting, and the house was filled with smoke.
